translations: 成形；外形；定形；比喻表达法；图案装饰法

sentences.sentence: Figurations and symbols on the arrangement plans of ships;
sentences.translation: 本标准规定在船舶布置图中表示梯及舷墙的图形符号。

sentences.sentence: And I'm going to ask you to think of all of the images here, the figurations of listening and hearing in the mask.
sentences.translation: 我叫你们想象下这场景，《面具》里听觉和视觉的轮廓。
